item.title: Mike Flanagan's Newest Stephen King Movie Life Of Chuck Sets 2025 Release Date
item.description: The Life of Chuck, the newest Stephen King story being adapted by director Mike Flanagan, has confirmed its 2025 theatrical release date.

item.title: Scream 7 Casts Ghostbusters Franchise Star In Mystery Role
item.description: Scream 7 has added a Ghostbusters star to its cast list, taking the performer from the supernatural world to the slasher universe ruled by Ghostface.

item.title: The Holiday's Biggest Ending Mystery Was Already Solved 9 Years Ago (& It's Perfect)
item.description: The Holiday's ending, while heartwarming, left a huge mystery, but luckily, this was already solved by the director herself nine years ago.
